feature: Immediately Authenticates After Install
description: App must immediately initiate OAuth authentication when a merchant installs the app, without requiring manual steps.
acceptance_criteria: App URL redirects to /auth endpoint automatically on first load
No intermediate screens before OAuth starts
OAuth flow begins within 1 second of app load
Works correctly when shop parameter is provided

feature: Immediately Redirects to App UI After Authentication
description: After OAuth callback completes, the app must immediately redirect the merchant to the main app UI without delays.
acceptance_criteria: Callback endpoint redirects to frontend URL with correct params
No intermediate loading screens or manual redirects required
App UI loads within embedded admin frame
User sees dashboard/main content immediately after auth

feature: Provides Mandatory Compliance Webhooks
description: App must implement mandatory GDPR compliance webhooks: customers/data_request, customers/redact, and shop/redact.
acceptance_criteria: Implement /webhooks/customers-data-request endpoint
Implement /webhooks/customers-redact endpoint
Implement /webhooks/shop-redact endpoint
Register webhook URLs in Shopify Partners dashboard
Webhooks return 200 OK response

feature: Verifies Webhooks with HMAC Signatures
description: All incoming webhooks must be verified using HMAC-SHA256 signature validation with the API secret.
acceptance_criteria: Extract X-Shopify-Hmac-Sha256 header from webhook requests
Compute HMAC-SHA256 of raw request body using API secret
Compare computed hash with header value (timing-safe comparison)
Reject webhooks with invalid signatures (401 response)
Log verification failures for debugging

feature: Uses a Valid TLS/SSL Certificate
description: All app endpoints must use HTTPS with a valid TLS certificate with no errors.
acceptance_criteria: CloudFront distribution serves over HTTPS
API Gateway endpoints use HTTPS
TLS certificate is valid and not expired
No mixed content warnings
Certificate chain is complete and trusted
No SSL errors when accessing any endpoint

feature: App Capabilities Configuration (Connector, Embedded)
description: Verify app has correct capabilities configured: connector and embedded app settings.
acceptance_criteria: Embedded app setting is enabled in Partners dashboard
App capabilities match selected options (connector, embedded)
shopify.app.toml reflects correct configuration
App loads correctly within Shopify Admin iframe

feature: Using Latest App Bridge from Shopify CDN
description: App must load the latest App Bridge script from Shopify's CDN (not bundled or self-hosted).
acceptance_criteria: App Bridge loaded via https://cdn.shopify.com/shopifycloud/app-bridge.js
No locally bundled @shopify/app-bridge packages in production build
Script tag present in index.html or loaded dynamically from CDN
App Bridge version is current/supported
App Bridge used from OAuth flow onwards

feature: Using Session Tokens for User Authentication
description: App must use Shopify session tokens (JWT) for authenticating API requests instead of cookies.
acceptance_criteria: App Bridge getSessionToken() used to obtain session tokens
Session token sent in Authorization header for API requests
Backend validates session token signature and claims
No cookie-based authentication for embedded app
Token refresh handled before expiration

feature: Must Have UI Merchants Can Interact With
description: App must provide a functional user interface that merchants can interact with.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays meaningful content
All buttons and controls are functional
Navigation works correctly
UI responds to user interactions
No dead ends or non-functional screens

feature: App Free from Critical UI/Functional Errors
description: App must be free from user interface errors, bugs, and functional errors that fully prevent the review.
acceptance_criteria: No JavaScript errors in console that break functionality
All core features work as expected
No blank screens or infinite loading states
Error states handled gracefully
App does not crash during normal usage

feature: App Free from Partial UI/Functional Errors
description: App must be free from user interface errors, bugs, and functional errors that partially prevent completing the review.
acceptance_criteria: No minor UI glitches or visual bugs
All secondary features work correctly
Forms validate and submit properly
Loading states display appropriately
Responsive design works on different screen sizes

feature: Must Use Shopify APIs After Install
description: App must use Shopify APIs to interact with store data after installation.
acceptance_criteria: App uses Shopify Admin API for data operations
API calls use stored access token
Proper API versioning in requests
Rate limiting handled appropriately
No direct database access bypassing Shopify APIs

feature: Must Not Request .myshopify.com URLs from Merchants
description: App must not ask merchants to manually enter their .myshopify.com URL.
acceptance_criteria: Shop domain obtained from OAuth flow automatically
No input fields asking for myshopify.com URL
Shop parameter passed through App Bridge host
Installation flow does not require manual URL entry

feature: Must Re-install Properly
description: App must handle re-installation correctly when a merchant uninstalls and reinstalls.
acceptance_criteria: Uninstall webhook cleans up or marks credentials appropriately

New access token stored correctly
Previous data handled appropriately (retained or cleared based on app logic)
No duplicate entries or conflicts after reinstall

feature: Data Synchronization

acceptance_criteria: Data sync operations complete successfully

feature: Apps Must Not Launch Max Modal Without User Interaction
